SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class VirtualModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.VirtualModel
public class VirtualModel extends Object
This class represents the virtual model, for the proxy pattern. It defines new data structures for the game objects, with the essential information for the view.
